sentences.sentence: The blue part of the image is an isopod-a small crustacean.
sentences.translation: 图片中的蓝色部分是一个等足类动物---一种小型的甲壳纲动物。

sentences.sentence: After a dozen years, the crustacean will grow to the size of a tractor tire.
sentences.translation: 十几年后，这种甲壳纲动物将长到拖拉机轮胎大小。

sentences.sentence: Researchers found the 70-millimeter crustacean in the dark shale of an Oklahoma quarry.
sentences.translation: 研究者在俄克拉荷马采石场的页岩层发现这些70毫米的甲壳纲动物。
